name: Treasure Box Thrift and Consignment
body:
### Welcome to Treasure Box Thrift and Consignment

We love finding and selling interesting and useful items. We sell a wide variety of things like bicycles,  paintings, antique furniture. Our inventory is constantly changing as we find new products to sell!

### Follow Us On Facebook

We publish pictures of new inventory and news about our store on our facebook page. If you like our store, please click the lick button on our facebook page: [Treasure Box Thrift and Consignment](https://www.facebook.com/pages/Treasure-Box-Thrift-Consignment-Store/129736050545608?fref=ts)

### Contact Us

Address: 50 Sullivan Street Suite F, Warrenton, Virginia 20186
Phone: (540) 359-6801
Email: warrentontreasures@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
